heading: HR00719
0: RESOLUTION TO URGE THE PHILHEALTH TO INCLUDE PSORIASIS IN THE LIST OF DISEASES AND AILMENTS COVERED BY ITS HEALTHCARE PROGRAM, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF MAKING PSORIASIS TREATMENT AVAILABLE ESPECIALLY TO THE MARGINALIZED AND LESSENING CASES OF PSORIASIS IN THE PHILIPPINES
mother-bill statusstatus: Adopted as Resolution No. HR00124 on 2018-05-30 Substituted by HR01818
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00719
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION TO URGE THE PHILHEALTH TO INCLUDE PSORIASIS IN THE LIST OF DISEASES AND AILMENTS COVERED BY ITS HEALTHCARE PROGRAM, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF MAKING PSORIASIS TREATMENT AVAILABLE ESPECIALLY TO THE MARGINALIZED AND LESSENING CASES OF PSORIASIS IN THE PHILIPPINES
